content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day September 5, 2024 Improving Email Security with URL Filtering Techniques September 5, 2024 Email security continues to be one of the key frontiers in modern digital environments where the menace of cyber threats has started to snowball into uncontrollable magnitudes. While these attacks are growing in sophistication, organizations now aim for better resilience in all such eventualities by factoring in advanced URL filtering techniques and advanced threat protection with a guarantee for improved protection against phishing, malware, and ransomware.
